thread.section_title: Stewart Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Outstanding Customer Service
thread.title_full: Outstanding Customer Service - Review of Stewart Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: travelntickets
title: Outstanding Customer Service
text:
I travel the country all year long and come into contact with many front desk employees. By far the best has been Andrew. His professionalism is unmatched when it comes to assisting you. This hotel is a short walk to time square and 35-45 min subway ride to Brooklyn.
I would've spent a ton in cab fares had it not been for the advice that Andrew provided. Don't pass up on the chance to stay here if you have plans for a Broadway play or an event at MSG.
